body.content:
Ciao, mi presento, il mio nome è Ricardo Gimenes Ferreira.
Piacere di conoscerti.

Sono un programmatore brasiliano che lavora principalmente con i piccoli siti Web e blog, di solito lo sviluppo dell'intero codice in PHP o ASP, come mio principale linguaggio di back-end e, come puoi vedere, non sono così bravo con il layout quando cerco di sviluppare da solo, ma sto cercando di migliorare.
One of my dreams is living abroad, leaving Brazil for a while, I want to face new problems and come back with good solutions for the old problems.

My main hobby is playing music, bass is my favorite musical instrument, but I know how to play the jews harp, the kalimba and other small instruments, you can follow me on instagram, facebook or on youtube, I regularly post a few videos trying to play these amazing instruments.

Other thing that I like a lot is learning languages and conecting with people, I know how to speak English, Danish, Dutch, French, Italian, Japanese, Spanish, Russian and Portuguese(being my native language), so since I know how to speak those languages I tried to make a multilanguage website.
